mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file ( name, length, md5, real_path, ext, first_upload_time, first_upload_user_id ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{length}, #{md5}, #{realPath}, #{ext}, #{firstUploadTime}, #{firstUploadUserId} )
mapper.select: SELECT f.id id, f.name name, f.length length, f.md5 md5, f.real_path realPath, f.ext ext, f.first_upload_time firstUploadTime, f.first_upload_user_id firstUploadUserId FROM file f WHERE f.md5=#{md5}
